headline: Rechecking Fox (FOXA) Valuation After Strong One Year Shareholder Returns
summary: With no single headline event driving fresh attention, Fox (FOXA) is on investors’ radar as they reassess its recent share performance and fundamentals, including revenue of US$16.474b and net income of US$2.035b. See our latest analysis for Fox. Fox’s recent trading has been relatively steady, with the share price at US$72.78 and a 90 day share price return of 12.58% sitting alongside a 1 year total shareholder return of 43.55%. This combination points to momentum that has been building over...

headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Fox (FOXA) After A 43.5% Share Price Jump
summary: If you are wondering whether Fox is still good value after its recent run, this article walks through what the current share price might be implying and how that stacks up against several valuation yardsticks. Fox shares closed at US$72.78, with returns of 43.5% over the past year and very small moves of a 0.1% decline over 7 days, a 0.4% decline over 30 days and a 1.3% decline year to date, hinting that expectations and risk perceptions may be shifting.
